entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell flyout throws an exception on Android if there's a FragmentLifecycle.Callback #27889
  • .NET MAUI App Not Supported on Redmi A3 After .NET 8 to 9 Upgrade #27886
  • MAUI Blazor Refreshview shows disabled spinner on Windows #27882
  • MauiContext is `null` in `Application.CreateWindow()` on Android #27881
  • [iOS] Cannot remove a Shadow at runtime #27879
  • Random crashes in iOS and Android #27875
  • IOS: PlatformView cannot be null here (Microsoft.Maui.IEditor) #27872
  • [Unstable]D11-When deploying the app to Android on some machines, cursive fonts didn't display correctly. #27868
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Maui -9.0.40 error : Failed to AOT compile SkiaSharp.Views.iOS.dll, the AOT compiler exited with code 139. #27867
  • [iOS 18] list does not render correctly in label with TextType="Html" #27866
  • Issue with iOS App Crashing in Test Flight #27865

Closed

  • [.NET 10] Internalize/remove MessagingCenter #16813
    .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Android] ListView + DataTemplateSelector + HasUnevenRows issue #24701
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Button background not appearing when setting Gradient and Shadow #12959
    Backlog
  • [iOS] App Crash on Startup when Interpreter is used with Release configuration. #27840
  • Release of maui 9.0 on the Windows platform #27869
  • .net 9 Android ignoring Android primary color #27850

PullRequests

Created

  • remove Dispose call on ShellItemRenderer #27890
    community ✨
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #27888
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-dialogalert, area-controls-dialog, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Windows] Fix Indicator View Causing Looping Issue with CarouselView #27880
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 2 #27878
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix "PlatformView cannot be null here" Exception using VisualStates #27877
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/windows 🪟
  • [Testing] - Reenable UITest VerifyInitialEntryReturnTypeChange with Adjustments for Navigation Bar Height Discrepancies on Android #27876
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix flaky tests 6 #27874
    area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • [Windows] Fixed Shadow not updated when Clipping a View with a shadow #27873
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed a crash in CarouselViewHandler2 on iOS 15. #27871
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Adding some copilot instructions #27864

Merged

  • Internalize/remove MessagingCenter #27842
    t/breaking 💥, area-architecture, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [ci] Move to Sequoia machines #27787
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR5
  • Don't need to register ApplicationStub #27885
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 11029468 #27789
  • Revert "Fix concurrency issues and leak reliability" #27870
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [ci] Update slnf location and arcade #27860
    area-infrastructure
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #27863
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #26693
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • BindableLayout should dispatch layout changes when collection changes from background thread #24714
    area-layout, do-not-merge, community ✨
  • Fixed the FlyoutPage.Flyout Disappearing When Maximizing the Window on Mac Platform #26701
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows/Android] Fix Dynamic ShellContent Title Updates at Runtime #27609
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Update SkiaSharp #26373
    area-drawing, p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Investigating things for easier Aspire integration #24365
    area-core-hosting
  • [net10.0] Set `UseRidGraph=false` on Windows (attempt 2) #27679
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Update gradle version for AndroidNative app from 7.6.1 to 8.12.1. #27859
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed ImageButton not honoring Padding value. #26785
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 5 #27564
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Improve VisualState order and prevent sticky Focused visual state #27477
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed ScrollView inside a Grid expands width past device screen when Rotated #27839
    community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Shell Navigation to a page without a Tabbar #27779
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Windows] - Handle Dynamic Updates for CanDrag and AllowDrop in Drag and Drop Gesture #27845
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Updated FlakyTestAttribute to allow retries #27772
    area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for Shadows #27701
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Fixed the CollectionView scroll the content inside Editor when tapping to get focus on it #27851
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 10 #27751
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 11 #27764
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for TabBar Navigation does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] OnAppearing and OnNavigatedTo don't work when using the 'More' tab - fix #27857
    area-core-lifecycle, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed picker allows user input if the keyboard is visible #26382
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] [Shell] The 'More' tab - nav bar customization #27848
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 4 #27561
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 2 #27500
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 1 #27695
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 12 #27804
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed the SwipeView items were not displayed properly #27399
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Editor vertical text alignment not working after toggling IsVisible #26194
    community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed - Grouped CollectionView items not rendered properly on Android, works on Windows #27847
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
